txt.en: Collect toughened Huorn bark ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collected Sigil of War
Collect Wildwood Orc knives ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Hunward has asked you to find toughened Huorn bark and Wildwood Orc knives from creatures in the Wildwood.
Hunward is at Trader's Wharf in the Wildwood.
'DNT - Blah!'
Worms may be found in Forochel and Angmar. Dread-turtles may be found in Malenhad in Angmar.\n\nHunward asked you to bring him clouded worm eyes and venomous dread turtle beaks.

'These will do nicely! The next materials I need you to gather will bring you further afield, to places of greater danger. I speak of the snowy wastes of Forochel, and of the dread land called Angmar.\n\n'Bring me the clouded eyes of worms such as dwell in Forochel and Angmar. I will also need the beaks of the dread-turtles that crawl in Angmar alone. Beware their hard shells, and see that your punches find only the soft meat within!'
Hunward is at Trader's Wharf in the Wildwood.
'DNT - Blah!'
DNT - Blah!

'Well done, my friend! These materials are just what I sought. But there are two more items I will need, and you may find the collection of them most taxing!\n\n'Barashal the Gorthorog and Gruglok of Urugarth are fearsome opponents. From Barashal, collect a crimson Gorthorog-horn. He is to be found at the dread city of Carn Dûm. You will gain from Gruglok at Urugarth a Sigil of War, if you are able to best him in combat.'
Deliver the last batch of materials to Hunward at Trader's Wharf
Collected clouded worm eyes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collected venomous dread turtle beaks ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Many are the folk who underestimate the might of a good Brawler. \qWhere is your sword or your spear?\q they ask, only to learn we have no need of such weapons, to their sorrow.

'I will fashion you a fine set of battle-gauntlets, but I will need you to bring me a number of materials. Know that this will not be easy! I will use some of these items to craft your weapons, but others of them will be used to prove that you are deserving of such equipment! So it was for me, and so it will be for you.

'First I will need toughened Huorn bark from the Huorns that stalk the Wildwood, and Wildwood Orc knives from the Orcs in this land. Bring them to me and I will task you to find materials that must be gathered further afield, in more dangerous places.'

'I am pleased to see you have returned, [placeholder], and that you bring with you some of the swords of the Ongbúrz. They will no longer add notches to these for each of our friends they slay.

'I rejoice too that you have deprived Tramug of his hand-axe! His tale ends with you, it seems!

'Go now and bring me claws from the Wargs who stalk through eastern Angmar and other dangerous places, like Eregion and the Misty Mountains. I also need the barbed barghest-tails from those creatures which haunt Imlad Balchorth.'
'DNT - Blah!'
'Where are the components I requested, [placeholder]?'
Hunward is at Trader's Wharf in the Wildwood.

'I am glad to see you again, [placeholder]. These components will greatly improve the weapon I am making for you.\n\n'Seek out the vile drake Lhugrien and obtain from her a flawless scale. Also acquire for me a Sigil of War from the evil Gruglok. Both may be found at Urugarth.'

'I never doubted you for a moment, [placeholder]! Well done indeed, and in return for your fine efforts I give to you these battle-gauntlets. May they serve you well wherever your adventures take you!\n\n'Your opponents will come to fear each of your strikes, for they will be deadlier than ever before!'
'You do not have the components for which I asked, [placeholder].'
Collected notched Ongbúrz-swords ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'First I will need toughened Huorn bark from the Huorns that stalk the Wildwood, and Wildwood Orc knives from the Orcs in this land. Bring them to me and I will task you to find materials that must be gathered further afield, in more dangerous places.'

'You return victorious, [placeholder]! I bow to your skill, for I know Lhugrien and Gruglok to be fearsome opponents!\n\n'You are a most worthy champion, my friend, and it is an honour to know you. I give to you this weapon with my earnest hope that it will serve you long and well!'
Collect Tramug's hand-axe
Collected crimson Gorthorog-horn
'You do not have the components I need, [placeholder]?'
Collected splintered Warg-claws ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collected barbed barghest-tails ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collected a flawless scale of Lhugrien
Collected a Sigil of War

'Bring me the clouded eyes of worms such as dwell in Forochel and Angmar. I will also need the beaks of the dread-turtles that crawl in Angmar alone. Beware their hard shells, and see that your punches find only the soft meat within!'
Hunward at Trader's Wharf in the Wildwood has agreed to fashion you a fine set weapons for your fists.
Collected toughened Huorn bark ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect a Sigil of War
Bring final set of components to Gwesgylliel

Collect a Sigil of War\n
Barashal may be found at Carn Dûm in Angmar. Gruglok is at Urugarth in Angmar.\n\nHunward asked you to bring him a crimson Gorthorog-horn and a Sigil of War.

Collect splintered Warg-claws ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect barbed barghest-tails ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'You are missing something.'
Collect a flawless scale of Lhugrien

'Barashal the Gorthorog and Gruglok of Urugarth are fearsome opponents. From Barashal, collect a crimson Gorthorog-horn. He is to be found at the dread city of Carn Dûm. You will gain from Gruglok at Urugarth a Sigil of War, if you are able to best him in combat.'
Deliver the second batch of materials to Hunward at Trader's Wharf
Ongbúrz Orcs may be found in Fasach-falroid in Angmar. Tramug stalks the swamps of Malenhad in Angmar.\n\nGwesgylliel asked you to bring her notched Ongbúrz-swords and Tramug's hand-axe.
Gwesgylliel is at Lin Giliath in Meluinen, in the North Downs.\n\nGwesgylliel is waiting for you to return with the first set of components she needs.

Wargs may be found in Angmar and other dangerous places, such as Eregion and the Misty Mountains. Barghests may be found in Imlad Balchorth in Angmar.\n\nGwesgylliel asked you to bring her splintered Warg-claws and barbed barghest-tails.
Gwesgylliel is at Lin Giliath in Meluinen, in the North Downs.\n\nGwesgylliel is waiting for you to return with the second set of components she needs.
Lhugrien and Gruglok may both be found at Urugarth in Angmar.\n\nGwesgylliel asked you to bring her a flawless scale of Lhugrien and a Sigil of War.
Gwesgylliel is at Lin Giliath in Meluinen, in the North Downs.\n\nGwesgylliel is waiting for you to return with the last set of components she needs.
'You're missing something.'

Collect crimson Gorthorog-horn
'You may find the Ongbúrz encamped in Fasach-Falroid in Angmar. In the eastern reaches of Angmar, in Malenhad, you may find Tramug.'
'You may find Wargs in places like Angmar, Eregion, and the Misty Mountains. The barghests I seek may be found in Imlad Balchorth in Angmar.'
Collect Sigil of War
'The fortress-city of Urugarth is a place of evil, [placeholder], but it also holds the remaining components I need for your weapon.'
Deliver the first batch of materials to Hunward at Trader's Wharf
Implements of Striking
